page.title: 15Health care in Bwlchysarnau
page.content: The inhabitants belong either to the general practice in Llanidloes (10 miles away) or Rhayader (8 miles).In Rhayader they have one afternoon a week where only people from out of town can call, without an appointment Casualty depts. exist at Llandrindod Cottage Hospital or Llanidloes Cottage Hospital but both have very limited x-ray facilities and serious cases are sent to Hereford or Aberystwyth. There is a maternity unit at Llanidloes Hospital but first babies & any complications are sent to Aberystwyth. There is a dental practitioner in Rhayader, one day a week, and full time in Llanidloes. Children at the Primary school receive a comprehensive service at school of dental treatment, if parents so wish and physical & developmental checkups at regular intervals.
